attributes.action: stop the closure of Calne White Horse Leisure Centre
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is the only sports centre in Calne open to the public. It not only hosts the Calne Alpha Swimming Club (150 members) but football clubs, gymnastic clubs, squash, badminton etc etc. It's utter madness to close this facility. The Government has to step in and stop the closure.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "stop the closure of Calne White Horse Leisure Centre."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13095.asp

Prime Minister's Office
